name: Project K.
description: I started working on this recently. I'm not sure what I want to make it into really, but hey, it looks cool! I was thinking about making it a action-stealth game or something. Right now, it isn't much of a game. Just a short demo where you can walk, run, jump, and look around. It makes use of the Unity LWRP, so you might need a beefier computer to run it, but then again, what do I know? Above is a web build version 0.1!
